metadata.name: Eclipse of the DeathBird
metadata.description:
"Eclipse of the DeathBird" is the first of its kind collaboration between  Slivereign and Karl Trewhela. Hand-drawn with pen and ink on paper, this artwork is a true testament to the power of creative collaboration and the beauty that can arise from the fusion of different artistic styles.

The piece explores the theme of death and rebirth, with the titular DeathBird depicted in haunting detail as it eclipses the sun. The intricate patterns and textures that make up the creature's form are awe-inspiring, with a delicate balance of light and dark energy that creates a sense of otherworldly beauty.

The gothic aesthetic of the piece is enhanced by the use of dark, moody colors and a sense of foreboding that permeates every inch of the artwork. The influence of Gustave Dor√© and old monster movies is evident in the terrifying creatures that lurk in the shadows, adding to the surreal and dreamlike quality of the piece.
